questions.text: Where are you currently based? (City and Town and Postal Code)
Are you eligible to work in the UK?
Do you have a current DBS certificate that is registered on the Update Service?
How many days per week are you available to work?
Are you available to start immediately?

No.text: What is your earliest start date?

questions.text: Do you have experience working with children in a school or childcare setting?
Have you previously worked in a supply role?

Yes.text: Which agency did you work with?

questions.text: Do you have access to your own transport?
How far are you willing to travel for work? (in miles)
Do you have any restrictions on your availability due to childcare, study, or other commitments?
What motivates you to work in schools?
